TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FilterEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 提供與 事件相關聯的資訊與事件資料。

span.span: Provides information and event data that is associated with the event.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定事件處理常式事件。The following example shows how to set an event handler for the event. 在此範例中，`listingDataView`的執行個體。In this example, `listingDataView` is an instance of . [!code-csharp[DataBindingLab#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataBindingLab/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#10)] [!code-vb[DataBindingLab#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataBindingLab/VisualBasic/MainWindow.xaml.vb#10)] 下列範例顯示的範例實作`ShowOnlyBargainsFilter`篩選事件處理常式。The following example shows the implementation of the example `ShowOnlyBargainsFilter` filter event handler. 這個事件處理常式會使用屬性來篩選掉`AuctionItem`具有物件`CurrentPrice`$25.00 或更新版本。This event handler uses the property to filter out `AuctionItem` objects that have a `CurrentPrice` of $25.00 or greater. [!code-csharp[DataBindingLab#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataBindingLab/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#5)] [!code-vb[DataBindingLab#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataBindingLab/VisualBasic/MainWindow.xaml.vb#5)] 完整的範例，請參閱[資料繫結示範](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=163703)。For the complete example, see [Data Binding Demo](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=163703).
